Item 8.01 - Other Events.content: On April 22, 2024, JPMorgan Chase & Co. closed public offerings of (i) $750,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Floating Rate Notes due 2028, (ii) $2,500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes due 2028, (iii) $2,750,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes due 2030 and (iv) $3,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes due 2035. The Notes were registered under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, pursuant to a registration statement on Form S-3 (File No. 333-263304), as amended. In connection with these offerings, the legal opinion as to the legality of the Notes is being filed as Exhibit 5.1 to this report.
